api/calendar-grid.title: CalendarGrid
api/calendar-grid.description: The CalendarGrid component displays a month calendar with selectable days. It's the building block for the DatePicker calendar variant.

api/datepicker.title: DatePicker
api/datepicker.description: The DatePicker component provides a flexible date selection interface with multiple variants and themes.

api/hooks.title: Hooks
api/hooks.description: Kaal provides React hooks for managing date and time picker state.

api/timepicker.title: TimePicker
api/timepicker.description: The TimePicker component provides time selection with iOS wheel style or Material Design 3 clock face.

api/utilities.title: Utilities
api/utilities.description: Kaal exports utility functions for working with dates and times.

api/wheel-picker.title: WheelPicker
api/wheel-picker.description: The WheelPicker component provides an iOS-style spinning wheel for selecting values. It's used internally by DatePicker and TimePicker wheel variants.

examples/basic-datepicker.title: Basic DatePicker
examples/basic-datepicker.description: A simple date picker with calendar view.

examples/theming.title: Theming
examples/theming.description: Kaal uses react-native-unistyles v3 for theming. Customize colors, spacing, and typography to match your app's design.

examples/timepicker-ios.title: TimePicker (iOS Style)
examples/timepicker-ios.description: The iOS-style TimePicker uses spinning wheels for hour, minute, and AM/PM selection.

examples/timepicker-material.title: TimePicker (Material Style)
examples/timepicker-material.description: The Material-style TimePicker uses a clock face for intuitive time selection, following Material Design 3 guidelines.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: This guide will help you install and configure Kaal in your React Native project.

guides/migration-from-temporal.title: Migration from Temporal
guides/migration-from-temporal.description: Guide for migrating from Temporal API to native Date API in Kaal v1.0.

guides/platform-differences.title: Platform Differences
guides/platform-differences.description: Kaal provides consistent APIs across platforms while respecting platform conventions.

guides/theming.title: Theming Guide
guides/theming.description: Learn how to customize Kaal's appearance to match your app's design system.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Kaal is a high-performance DatePicker and TimePicker library for React Native, built with modern architecture and minimal footprint.
